job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongData ScientiststrongppbrppThe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersnbspppbrppstrongLocation strongNorthnbspAustin office if youd like to use itppstrongSalarystrong 120k  135kppstrongVisa Statusstrong US CitizenppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingliliDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsliliCollaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionliliGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliMS in quantitative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering etcliliAt least 1  2 years of experience as a Data ScientistliliDeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning clustering and classification techniques and algorithmsliliFluency in PythonliliFamiliarity with Big Data frameworks and visualization tools Cassandra Hadoop Spark TableauliulpbrppFor further details please submit a resumeppbrppAustin Fraser Inc is acting as an employment business in relation to this advert As a professional company we gladly welcome applications from persons of any age and background and do not intend to discriminate with advert text and terminologyp
